scripts.web: cd packages/web && npm run build && npm start
scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev-web" "npm run dev-api" "npm run watch-packages"
scripts.start: npm run build-packages && concurrently "npm run web" "npm run api"
scripts.postinstall: cd packages/api && npm install && cd ../web && npm install && cd ../optimus-code-api && npm install && cd ../bumblebee-utils && npm install
